intent_context: Cannot access online account to view balance or pay
failure_detail: Agent pulled up the wrong record (Kenneth Beaumont) despite customer providing a specific contract ID and name.

clarifications.note: Asked to confirm name on contract
Requested name spelling again after mismatch

corrections.note: Customer rejected completely incorrect name provided

loops.subject: account verification
loops.note: Repeatedly failed to verify name against record

summary: Customer wanted to pay maintenance fees but couldn't access their account. The agent found a record using the contract ID but it belonged to a different person, leading to a verification failure and transfer.
verbatim: I'm looking at owner's invoice. And my name is on the owner's invoice. Sandra... Haining.
coaching: The agent should have re-verified the contract ID digits when the name 'Kenneth Beaumont' didn't match 'Sandra Haining' instead of repeatedly asking for the name spelling.

actions.detail: Name Sandra Haining did not match Kenneth Beaumont
Transferred to concierge due to verification failure
